loans.use: to purchase peanuts, cooking oil, flour, beans, eggs, refreshments, etc.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 26 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Erlinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell such as rice, condiments, and other groceries.

Erlinda has been in this business for six years.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as rice, condiments, and other groceries.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
As a parent of four children, Michelle works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Michelle is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Michelle has been sustaining her business activities through her past loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Livia

texts.en:
Livia is 53 years old and married with five children.

Livia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, bread, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, soap, shampoo and other personal care products.

Livia has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from vegetable vending.

Livia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocereis to sell like canned goods, bread, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, soap, shampoo and other personal care products

loans.name: Leyla

texts.en: Leyla lives with her son, her husband is deceased.  She started a business to knit baby clothing to make money.  She will use the loan to buy yarn and knit more baby items. .

loans.use: to buy braided rope.

loans.name: Las Tejedoras De Chuacalibal L Group

texts.es:
Sebastiana (la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa color Salmon) es una señora de 41 años de edad es soltera y cuenta con una linda familia de dos hijos de los cuales tienen entre 12 y 7 años, viven en una comunidad del departamento de Quiché, para Sebastiana no hay nada más importante que su hermosa familia y para poder brindarles lo mejor se dedica a la elaboración de hermosos trajes típicos de su región ella tiene 8 años de ejercer esta bonita labor, pero Sebastiana con el afán de seguir mejorando sus servicios y sus ingresos a tomado la decisión de organizar a un grupo de señoras que tiene el mismo propósito de prosperar para juntas adquirir un crédito que lo invertirán en la compra de diferentes tipos  y colores de hilos para elaborar los trajes y bríndale a su familia una buena calidad de vida.
Sebastiana tiene el sueño de poder construir una casa de block para que sus hijos tengan una casa digna para vivir.
texts.en: Sebastiana (the first one the left-hand side in the picture with a salmon-colored blouse) is a 41-year-old women, single, and has a sweet family of two children who are 12 and 7 years old. They live in a community in the Department of Quiche. For Sebastiana, there is nothing more important than her beautiful family and to be able to provide them the best. She makes a living making beautiful dresses that are traditional to her region. She has 8 years practicing this pretty craft. Sebastiana, with the desire to improve her services and income, has made the decision to organize a group of women who have the same purpose for prospering in order to obtain a loan together. They will invest in purchasing different types and colors of thread to make the dresses and provide their family with a good quality of living. Sebastiana has a dream to be able to build a house made of cement blocks so that her children can have a decent house to live in.

loans.use: to buy thread for making traditional clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco es un pequeño productor de café en el departamento de Jinotega, Nicaragua. Su finca es de 7 hectáreas de las cuales 0.5 son de café. En los últimos años ha logrado cosechar un promedio de 16.66 quintales de café pergamino. Su visión es duplicar su producción de café, para ello se ha propuesto una plan de inversión gradual que le permita aplicar en forma adecuada y oportuna, los insumos agrícolas que mejorarán la nutrición de las plantas. 

Para este año, Marco está solicitando un financiamiento para la adquisición de insumos agrícolas que le ayudarán a incrementar la productividad de su finca, con lo que logrará mejorar las condiciones actuales de su familia.
texts.en:
Marco is a small coffee producer in the Department of Jinotega, Nicaragua. His farm is 7 hectares, of which 0.5 are of coffee. In the last few years, he has been able to harvest an average of 16.66 quintals of pergamino coffee. His vision is to duplicate his coffee production. For this, he has proposed a plan for gradual investments which will allow him to apply, in an suitable and timely manner, agricultural inputs that will improve the nutrition of the plants.

For this year, Marco is requesting funding for the purchase of agricultural inputs which will help him improve the productivity of his farm, which will improve the current conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs which he will use in his coffee plantation to increase the productivity of his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two sacks of rice, flour, sugar, and also soap

loans.name: Janette

texts.en:
“Sari-sari” store is a usual enterprise in the Philippines. Sari-sari (a Filipino term for variety) stores sell different products like biscuits, candies, canned goods, noodles, toiletries and many other items that are needed in individual’s daily living. The proliferation of this business makes the competition stiff. Store owners try many techniques to make it stable and competitive. Janette from Davao City tries combining her variety store with direct selling of Avon products such as lotion, perfumes, powder and other personal necessities.

Not only does she run the store, she also converted part of their house into a boarding house and ventured into load retailing for cellphones. In this way, her boarders have a one-stop-shop. Somehow her income provides for their daily expenditures and the higher education needs of one of her children. Janette is also preparing for the college education of her younger children. She has to improve her store by obtaining more supplies of grocery items and beverages. She is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan for this purpose. Part of the loan will be allotted to her e-loading and direct selling businesses.

In due time, she hopes that her enterprises will progress and will give her family a comfortable life. Janette regularly meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more supplies of grocery items and beverages

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is a 61-year-old widowed woman with eight children who is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Lilia has operated a spices business for 30 years and requests 15, 000 PHP through NWTF to buy more spices to sell.

In the future, Lilia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more spices.

loans.name: Ma. Nancy

texts.en:
Ma. Nancy is a 34-year-old married who is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Ma. Nancy sold beverages for 13 years and requests 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy soft drinks and other beverages.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and requests another loan to further build her businesses.

 In the future, Ma. Nancy would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and other beverages.

loans.name: Valeria Estefania

texts.es: Valeria tiene 19 años de edad es soltera vive con sus padres, ella trabaja de ayudante de cocina en un restaurant y solicita el crédito para cubrir los gastos del curso de Enfermeria, gracias al credito podra pagar y tener un titulo para poder trabajar en algun Hospital o clinica y mejorar sus ingresos, el curso se realizara en Guaranda, en su tiempo libre le gusta leer y nadar.
texts.en: Valeria, who is 19  years old, is single and lives with her parents.  She works as a kitchen assistant in a restaurant and is asking for a loan to cover the costs of a course in Nursing.  Thanks to the loan she will be able to pay for and have a degree in able to work in a hospital or clinic and increase her income.  The course takes place in Guaranda.  In her free time, Valeria likes to read and swim.

loans.use: to pay school fees for a course in Nursing

loans.name: Sevim

texts.en:
Sevim is married and a mother of three. She is a retired teacher. After retirement she started to make jewelry and sold it to her friends. Later on she sold it at a stall. With the help of the loan she is planning to buy materials for her jewelry making and increase her income.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Sevim Hanım evli üç çocuk annesi. Sevim hanım emekli öğretmen, emekli olduktan sonra takı işlerini hobi olarak yapıyormuş, yaptığı takıları arkadaşları satın almaya başlamış. Takıları stantlara da çıkararak satılır hale getirmiş. Aldığı mikro kredi ile takı malzemesi alarak üretip satarak para kazanmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy materials for her jewelry making business.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.en:
Jorge (left) and his wife, Ismerida (right), a cosigner for the loan, own El Mexicano Bar and Restaurant, a family business located in Clifton. Dedicated to serving traditional Mexican food made from only the freshest ingredients, El Mexicano offers a wide variety of dishes and drinks, including Chicharron Ahumado, and the popular Margarita Sundays. El Mexicano is a sit down restaurant that also offers takeout and catering for large events. Over the years, this restaurant has come to be known for exceptional customer service, delicious Mexican food, as well as its unique decor. El Mexicano Bar and Restaurant has cultivated a returning customer base.

Jorge and Ismerida are seeking an investment to help grow the restaurant and serve more people. This loan will help paint and remodel the building to maintain the vibrant decorations that make El Mexicano so authentic.

loans.use: to paint and remodel his restaurant

loans.name: Nathongkhaivieng Group

texts.en: Amphan is excited the filter is available on an affordable payment plan.  Amphan and her group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years.  The water filter Amphan and her group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to five years. Amphan and her group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Amphan and her group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Blanca Guadalupe

texts.es:
Bianca, de 28 años de edad, vive en su casa con sus 2 hijo,   estudio bachillerato, viven con ella sus hijos y su esposo quien trabaja en la agricultura y en lo  pecuario.

Bianca, es empleada de un centro de alcance, tiene 5 años de estar en este trabajo, anteriormente se dedicaba a vender frutas y verduras, la distancia del trabajo a su hogar es de 3 kilómetros,  el horario es de 7 a 3 de la tarde.

  
el credito sera utilizado en la compra de cemento, hierro y arena, material que utilizara para mejorar su casa, la necesidad que será satisfecha es que tendría una casa más digna y con mejores condiciones para habitarla.

El sueño de Bianca es preparar a sus hijos para que puedan graduarse de la universidad, también quiere mejorar y ampliar su casa.
texts.en:
Bianca, 28 years old, lives in her house with her two children. She pursued a bachelors degree. She lives with her children and her husband who works in agriculture and livestock.

Bianca is employed in an outreach center. She has been working there for five years. Previously, she earned a living selling fruits and vegetables. The distance between her job and her house is 3 kilometers. Her working hours are from 7 to 3 in the afternoon.

The loan will be used to buy cement, iron and sand, which are materials she will use to improve her house. The need that will be satisfied is that she will have a more decent house and better living conditions.

Bianca's dream is to prepare her children so that they can graduate from the university. She also wants to improve and expand her house.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, and sand.

loans.name: Gülşen

texts.en: Gülşen is a married woman with four children,  three are married.  After her husband's retirement, they had financial problems and she started a home-based jewelry making business.  She will use the loan to buy materials to make jewelry and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy jewelry materials.

loans.name: Selma

texts.en: Selma is a married woman with one school-aged child.  Her husband is tradesman. She contributes financially to the family budget with her jewelry-making business.  She will use the loan to buy supplies and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy jewelry making supplies.

loans.name: Grain De Cote 2 Group

texts.fr: Malien, Salia est âgé de 34 ans. Il n’est pas eu l’occasion d’aller à l’école. Il est de teint clair, et est père de 2 enfants toutes des filles. Elles sont toutes à l’école. Comme il a pu se faire des briques avec ses économies antérieures son rêve est de s’acheter de la tôle et se construire un bon habitat pour sa famille et avec comme espoir le prêt qu’il prend au R M C R. C’est l’homme qui tient la corde du bœuf sur la photo. Il prend le prêt au RMCR pour acheter des bœufs pour l’élevage. Il s’approvisionne au marché environnant et vend au même marché après l’engraissement. Le bénéfice récolté sur la vente des bœufs lui permet de prendre en charge : la santé, la nourriture et l’habillement de ses enfants ; cela pour un bénéfice moyen de 10 000f fcfa par mois par tête. Salia n’a pas eu de problème avec le prêt du RMCR. Il compte s’encourager dans son activité d’élevage et faciliter l’agriculture afin de satisfaire suffisamment sa vie et celle de ces enfants.
texts.en:
Salia is from Mali and is 34 years old. He did not get a chance to attend school. He is light-skinned and is the father of two children, both daughters. They are both in school. Since he was able to make some bricks with prior savings, his dream is to buy sheet metal and build a good house for his family, and with that hope he came to RMCR. He's the man who is holding the rope  of the cow in the photo. 

He is taking out the loan from RMCR to buy cattle to raise. He buys them at the local market and sells them at the same market after he has fattened them. The profit he makes on the cattle allows him to pay for healthcare, food, and clothing for his children. He has an average profit of 10,000 F CFA per month per head of cattle. 

Salia has not had a problem with the RMCR loan. He intends to work hard in his business of cattle raising and facilitate the agriculture so that he can sufficiently satisfy his needs and those of his children.

loans.use: to buy cattle to raise and then sell

loans.name: Pakha Group

texts.en: Khamsay is excited that the filter is available on an affordable payment plan.  Khamsay and his group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years.  The water filter Khamsay and his group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to 5 years.  Khamsay and his group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Khamsay and his group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Aivys Mercedes

texts.es: Aivys es una joven emprendedora que vende joyas de manera independiente, tiene su clientela  en diferentes partes de la provincia,  utiliza un vehículo con el que se traslada  para ofrecer sus productos . Su vehículo necesita algunas reparaciones , por lo que solicita un préstamo de $1.000 para  comprar los repuestos y pagar la reparación del mismo.
texts.en: Aivys is a young entrepreneur who sells jewelry independently. She has customers in different parts of the province. She uses a vehicle with which she travels to offer her products. Her vehicle needs some repairs so she is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase the spare parts and pay the repairs of the vehicle.

loans.use: to buy parts to fix her vehicle.

loans.name: Tursunoi

texts.en:
Tursunoi is a kind woman who was born in the northern part of Tajikistan into a family of workers. She lives in the biggest district with her family. She is married and has four children. 

She wants to open a catering service and has 3 years of experience. She wants to attract regular customers and open a catering business. She needs to buy vegetables, fruit, rent a place, and purchase other items. 

She hopes to be supported and awaits KIVA lenders' kindness.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, and rent a place.

loans.name: Deysi Tatiana

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito María Del Carmen se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla, ciudad de clima fresco y con muchos atractivos turísticos naturales propios de la zona.
En este lugar vive la señora Deysi, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijas de 13 y 8 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es comerciante. 
Doña Deysi es una mujer que siempre le gusta colaborar con los gastos que genera el hogar, ella realiza el crédito  para que su esposo lo utilice en su negocio, el se dedica a la venta de pescado, todos los días en la mañana el compra el mejor pescado ya sea por piezas grandes o pescado pequeños los mismos que  luego sale a vender en un  triciclo por toda la ciudad y lugares cercanos donde tiene mucha clientela. Lleva más de 18 años en este negocio el cual le permite ganar lo suyo y salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar pescado. Lleva más de 4 años en el Grupo De Crédito y agradece a las personas que le ayudan con los créditos ya que es así como ella y su familia puede salir adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The “María del Carmen” communal bank meets every 15 days in the Montecristi canton. This is where the famous straw hats come from. The city has a cold climate with many natural tourist attractions in the area.

This is where Deysi lives, she is 28 years old, married and has 2 daughters from this relationship, 13 and 8 years old who attend secondary and elementary school. Her husband is a merchant.  Deysi has always liked to help with the house expenses. She is requesting this loan so that her husband can use it for his business. He sells fish, every morning he buys the best fish, big pieces or small fish that he then sells in his tricycle. He sells in the city and in other nearby places where he has a lot of customers. He has more than 18 years in this business which allows him to earn his income and get ahead.

This loan is to buy fish. She has been a member of the communal bank for more than 4 years and she is thankful for those who help her with the loans because this is how she and her family can get ahead.  Her dreams are to provide the best for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is a 42-year-old married woman with five children who is a very hard working entrepreneur. She has two school-aged children.

Marissa has sold fish for 11 years and requests 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more boxes of fish to sell.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and  requests another loan to further build her businesses.

 In the future, Marissa would like to save enough money  to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Clara

texts.en:
Clara is 60 years old and married with nine children.

Clara works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like feeds, personal product care, and other groceries.

Clara has borrowed and paid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from buying and selling coconut wine.

Clara aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like feeds, personal product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Leonidas

texts.en:
Leonidas is a 58-year-old married woman with three children, who is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Leonidas has sold beauty products for 3 years and requests 25,000 PHP through NWTF to increase her inventory.

In the future, Leonidas would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Eugenio Manuel

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del Amor, un Cantón de clima cálido húmedo, el mismo cuenta varios sitios de descanso que son muy visitado por turistas nacionales y extranjeros se encuentra ubicado al noroccidente de la Provincia de Pichincha sus fiestas de Cantonización las celebran el 17 de julio de todos los años y sus fiestas religiosas en honor a San Miguel Arcangel Virgen de los Remedios las celebran en el mes de septiembre.
En este sector vive desde hace dos años Don Eugenio un hombre luchador de 60 años quien vive con su esposa y sus dos hijas una está embarazada pero él le apoya en todo porque  son su razón de vivir. 
Don Eugenio tiene un taxi anteriormente era chofer pero con mucho trabajo y sacrificio consiguió adquirir un taxi propio se dedica a esta actividad un promedio diario de 15 horas para poder llevar el alimento a su casa, es un hombre muy trabajador y muy conocido en el sector por su sencillez y humildad. Solicita el crédito para darle mantenimiento al taxi ya que es su principal herramienta de trabajo.
Eugenio agradece a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas ya que es la única institución que se preocupa por las personas que desean salir adelante.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del Amor is a warm, humid area.  It has many vacation areas that are visited by national and international tourists.  It is located in the northeast of the province of Pichincha.  Its celebrations of demarcation are celebrated on July 17 annually and its religious celebrations which honor St. Michael Arcangel and Virgen of los Remedios are celebrated in September.  

Don Eugenio has lived in this area for two years.  He is a hard working 60 year old man who lives with his wife and his two daughters.  One is pregnant and he supports her completely because his family is his reason for living.  

Don Eugenio has a taxi.  He was a chauffer but through much sacrifice and work he was able to acquire his own taxi.  He has worked as a taxi driver an average of fifteen hours a day to be able to bring food to his home.  He is a very hardworking and well known man in his neighborhood.  He is also known for his simplicity and humility.  

He is asking for the loan to do maintenance on his taxi, as it is his primary tool for earning income.  Eugenio is thankful to Kiva for its support and for the opportunities offered.  It is the only institution that is concerned for the people who are trying to better themselves.

loans.use: to maintain his car, which is his work vehicle.  With this income he will support his daughters and improve their quality of life.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is a 37-year-old married woman with five children. She lives in a rural community near Honiara city, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She owns and operates a small general store selling items such as rice, noodles, biscuits, snacks and drinks. She has been doing this for one year.

Anna requested a loan to buy bags of rice, noodles, and canned foods to restock her general store. She plans to use her profits to help cover her children's school fees and help meet her family's daily expenses.

She has been a SPBD member since 2014 to again access to financial services.

loans.use: helps Anna to buy bags of rice, noodles and canned food for her general store.

loans.name: Kevser

texts.en: Kevser is married and knits clothing and blankets for babies to sell at a a stand.  She will use the loan  to buy more yarn, make more products, and make more money.

loans.use: to buy more thread.

loans.name: Samath

texts.en:
SAMATH, 45, lives in a small community of Kompong Cham Province, Cambodia. He has three children. He has managed and operated a farming business and grown rice for twenty years. He earns an income 2.00 USD a day. 

He wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine to help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL because of it's lower interest rate.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Jaquline Del Rocio

texts.es:
Las socias del Grupo De Crédito U.R.S.A. se reúnen cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta, que es el balneario más importante, popular y visitado del Ecuador por sus hermosas y acogedoras playas, primer puerto de aguas profundas del Ecuador y sur América.
Aquí vive la señora Jaqueline, tiene 46 años, es casada y de este matrimonio tiene 1 hija mayor de edad que es casada. Vive en su casa propia con su esposo.
Doña Jaqueline con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante en el hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local. Trabaja todos los días, da crédito  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada quince días o al mes de acuerdo a lo que necesite. Tiene un año que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace cinco años  y le gusta por la puntualidad del promotor y el ambiente del grupo
texts.en: The members of the U.R.S.A. community bank meet every 2 weeks in the city of Manta, which is the most important, popular, and most visited thermal bath of Ecuador because of its beautiful and welcoming beaches, Ecuador and South America's first deep water port. Here lives Jaqueline, who is 46 years old, married, and who has a grown daughter who is married.  She lives in her own home with her husband. With the aim of earning her own money and using it to  get ahead, Jaqueline makes her living selling all types of clothing.  She sells door to door and also from her house, where she has a small shop.  She works every day, sells on credit, and collects every two weeks.  She goes to Guayaquil to buy her merchandise every 2 weeks or once a month, according to what she needs.  She has been in this business for a year, and it is going very well for her. She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise such as:  pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothes.  She has been part of this community bank for the past five years, and she likes it because of the facilitator's punctuality and the group dynamic.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothes.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
As a parent of six children, Norma works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell beverages business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Norma is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy more beverages like soft drinks, etc. for her buy-and-sell beverages business.

Norma has been sustaining her business activities through her past loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more beverages like soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.en:
Esperanza is a married woman with seven children. She is 48 years old and three of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Esperanza has a buy-and-sell fish business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 28 years.

Esperanza successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business. Esperanza requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

In the future, Esperanza would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia is 45 years old and married with six children, two of whom are in school. 

She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines, and has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and seedlings for her vegetable farm.

She has been farming vegetables for five years now and has borrowed from NWTF 11 times in the past to sustain her business.

In the future, Amalia would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for her vegetable farm.

loans.name: Jemma

texts.en:
Jemma is 45 years old and lives in Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region of Armenia.  She is married and has two daughters and a son.  Her husband is a farmer and she assists her husband in farming.

Jemma graduated Yerevan State University with a degree in Physics, and now works at the school as a physics teacher.  Jemma has 20 years of pedagogical experience and also gives private courses in physics at her home, preparing the pupils for entrance exams.  She mentions that she enjoys her occupation very much and does her best to teach or to help the pupils overcome any misunderstandings in the interesting but difficult subject of physics. 

Jemma requested a loan of 600,000 AMD to buy a computer and also some professional literature that are very important for her pedagogical activities.

loans.use: to buy a computer and also some professional literature for her pedagogical activities.

loans.name: Yoni Lenca

texts.es: Su nombre es Yoni, quien es una mujer de muy emprendedora que vive junto a su pareja y sus tres pequeños hijos en la localidad de Omate que pertenece a Moquegua. Ella gusta de contribuir económicamente en su hogar es por eso que se dedica a la cría de pollos orgánicos, ella sabe que lo orgánico es bueno para la salud y bienestar. Yoni solicita el micro crédito para comprar pollos y concentrado orgánico para alimentar a sus pollos. Su mayor deseo de Yoni es darle a su familia estabilidad económica y sobre todo una buena alimentación natural para que su familia goce de salud.
texts.en:
This is Yoni, and she is a very enterprising woman who lives with her partner and three small children in a place in Omate, which is part of Moquegua. 

She likes to contribute financially to her household. That is why she is raising organic chickens. She knows that organic is good for health and well-being. 

Yoni is seeking a micro-loan to buy chickens and organic feed to nourish her chickens. Yoni’s greatest wish is to give her family financial stability, and above all good natural food so that her family may enjoy health.

loans.use: To buy chickens and nutritious chicken feed.

loans.name: Juan Fernando

texts.es:
Juan a sus 19 años de edad, debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo y por necesidad económica se motiva a independizarse y conseguir ingresos por su cuenta, por eso desea iniciar un negocio de comidas rápidas que estará ubicado en una esquina muy transitada del barrio donde reside en municipio de San Vicente.
El desea ofrecer en su negocio arepas de queso, patacones de plátano, chorizos con arepa, butifarras, arepas de chócolo, gaseosas entre otros, con esto espera conseguir los recursos necesarios para satisfacer sus necesidades básicas. 

Juan es un joven trabajador, pujante, emprendedor, solicita el crédito como apoyo para invertirlo en la compra de activos fijos (sillas, carpa) e insumos para elaborar los alimentos (carnes frías, aceite, arepas, plátanos, gaseosas) para tener disponibilidad y variedad de productos que satisfagan los gustos de todos sus clientes, de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.

Gracias al apoyo de la Corporación Interactuar y a los prestamistas de Kiva podrá montar este negocio y conseguirá ser independiente.
texts.en:
Juan at 19 years old.  Due to the lack of employment opportunities and because of economic need, is motivated to become independent and earn his own living.  This is why he wants to start a fast food stand on a busy corner of his neighborhood in the town of San Vicente.  

He wants to offer cheese arepa (corn cake), fried plantain, sausage arepa (corn cake), meat and salad rolls, chocolate arepa, sodas and other items.  With this business he hopes to support his basic needs.  

Juan is a young, hardworking man.  He is enterprising and vigorous.  He is asking for the loan as support to invest in the purchase of chairs, a tent and ingredients to prepare the food he will offer (cheese arepas (corn cake), fried plantain, sausage arepa (corn cake), meat and salad rolls, chocolate arepas, sodas).  He wants to offer a variety of products to satisfy the taste of all of his customers.  In this way he will be able to have a better quality of life and wellbeing.   Thanks to the support of Corporation Interact and to the microloans of Kiva, he will be able to start this business and become independent.

loans.use: to purchase some specific assets (chairs, a tent) and ingredients to make the food.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.en:
Nigora is a generous woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1993. She is living in the biggest district with her family. She is single and lives with her parents. She graduated with a higher education with excellence, and currently is teaching at a primary school. She is a teacher of Russian language. 

In her free time, she wants to do business in agriculture. She is willing to have a vineyard and cultivate grapes. She needs to rent land near their house and wants to do business with her mother. 

She requested a loan to rent land to start doing business as a vineyard. She hopes and awaits your compassion.

loans.use: to rent land to start a vineyard

loans.name: Shadia

texts.en:
Shadia lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children and all of them go to school. She takes care of additional family members. She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include food and school fees.

She sells fruits and vegetables at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last five years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of 200,000 from MCDT– SACCO to buy pineapples, oranges, onions, cabbages and passion fruit. 

Her major challenge include the perishability of fruits and vegetables. Her goal and aspiration is to educate her children to the university level.

loans.use: To buy pineapples, oranges, onions, cabbages and passion fruit.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 39 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and also earns an income from dried fish vending. 

She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

Rosalie has been running the general store for 10 years. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Wylmar Ovidio

texts.es:
Wylmar es un hombre que a sus 23 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar como Criador de cerdos en el municipio donde reside, pues posee 4 algunas cerdas reproductoras, las crías las alimenta desde que nacen, luego las vende a diferentes productores de carne, quienes terminan de levantar las crías. 

Esta labor la aprendió de sus padres y tíos y lleva aproximadamente 2 años realizando esta actividad de manera independiente; es así como obtiene los recursos suficientes para aportar a la economía de su hogar. 

El cliente tiene espíritu emprendedor, es activo, pujante y lucha constantemente para poder progresar; esto lo motiva a solicitar el apoyo de un crédito con el que comprará 3 cerdas reproductoras, materiales para la adecuación de cocheras y alimento para sus animales, esto dará como resultado una mayor rentabilidad en el negocio y generará una estabilidad económica favorable para mejorar las condiciones de vida y el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Wylmar is a man that at 23 years old, makes his living working as a pig breeder in the municipality where he lives. As he owns some 4 breeding sows, he feeds their young from birth, then sells them to different meat producers who finish raising them.

He learned this work from his parents, aunts and uncles, and he has been carrying out this trade independently for approximately two years, so as to obtain sufficient resources to contribute to his household economically.

He has an entrepreneurial spirit, is active, vibrant, and constantly struggles to be able to get ahead. This motivates him to request the support of a loan with which he will buy 3 breeding sows, materials to make into pens, and food for his animals. This will result in higher business profitability and will generate favorable economic stability to improve his family's living conditions and well-being.

loans.use: to buy 3 breeding sows, materials to make into pens, and food for his animals.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
Maria es una humilde trabajadora residente en el municipio de Frontino con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. Es madre de 2 hijos por los cuales siempre tuvo el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida fuera la mejor.

Hoy en día se gana la vida con la elaboración y venta de almuerzos, estos alimentos los vende en su casa.
Le dedica 5 horas diarias a su negocio.

De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo, la principal es el alto costo de las materias primas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos como carne, verduras, granos, entre otros al por mayor para tener una muy buen producción, así podrá tener los ingresos suficientes para continuar con su negocio y sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a humble worker who lives a life full of dreams, hopes and best wishes for her family in Frontino municipality. She is the mother of two children and she has always had the fortitude and responsibility  to do what she needed to make their lives better. 

At present she makes her living making and selling lunches from her home. She spends 5 hours a day at her job. One of the main difficulties she faces in her work is the high cost of raw ingredients. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as meat, vegetables, grains, etc. to put out more product and, in that way, to have enough income to keep her business going and support her family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale ingredients such as meat, vegetables, grains, etc. to put out more product.

loans.name: Dianys Dominga

texts.es:
Dianys, de 28 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de comidas en su casa ubicada en el municipio de sahagun, en este negocio vende almuerzos y desayunos.

Dianys trabaja todos los días durante 3 horas, es una mujer muy responsable, juiciosa y aplicada con su negocio.

Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un negocio más competitivo en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. 

Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como la inseguridad del sector a manos de las bandas criminales.

Ella pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar sillas, ollas e insumos como pollo, aceite, harina, entre otros.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño y tendrá una mayor variedad de alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio dependen sus 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Dianys, who is 28 years old, has chosen to start a food business in her home. Her home is located in the town of Sahagun. She sells lunches and breakfasts. Dianys works every day for three hours. She is very responsible, sensible and hardworking in her business. 

Among her most latent dreams is to be able to have a more competitive business where she can provide different types of food and offer employment. She is facing multiple challenges such as the insecurity in her area at the hands of criminal gangs. 

She is asking for economic assistance to fund her business and buy chairs, pots and supplies like chicken, oil, and flour among others. The loan will impact her life and business in a favorable way since she will be able to fulfill her dream and she will have a greater variety of food to offer her customers. In addition, her three children also depend on this business.

loans.use: to fund her business and buy chairs, pots and supplies like chicken, oil, flour and others.

loans.name: Luis David

texts.es:
Luis con 31 años de edad y vive en unión libre. Toda su vida fue criado en el campo, donde ha realizado actividades agropecuarias la mayor parte de su vida.  

Actualmente posee cultivos de frutas, así logra obtener los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. 

Luis es un hombre serio, responsable, comprometido con su familia y su trabajo, por ello siempre quiere seguir avanzando es busca de un futuro mejor, por esta razón solicita un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas con el fin de continuar con el cuidado de sus cultivos y poder sacar una cosecha en óptimas condiciones; todo esto le ayudará a seguir adelante, mejorando poco a poco su nivel de vida y la de sus hijos, a los cuales les podrá ofrecer mejor educación para que tengan un futuro próspero y lleno de éxitos.
texts.en:
Luis is 31 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. All his life, he was raised on a farm, where he has done agriculture and livestock work for most of his life.

At present, he has fruit crops. With these, he succeeds in earning enough resources to bring food his home daily.

Luis is a serious and responsible man, who is dedicated to his family and to his work. As a result, he has always wanted to continue advancing in search of a better future. 

For this reason, he requests a loan to invest in buying agricultural supplies, such as manure, fertilizers, and pesticides, with the goal of continuing to grow his crops and to be able to make the harvest in the best conditions. 

All of this will help him continue forward, improving—little by little—the quality of his and his children’s lives. He will be able to offer his children the best education so that they have a prosperous future, full of successes.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies, such as manure, fertilizers, and pesticides, with the goal of continuing of grow his crops.

loans.name: Yeison Ferney

texts.es:
Yeison es un hombre trabajador y humilde, cualidades que tiene muy bien merecidas.
Inicio con un negocio de lavado de vehículos hace 5 años.
Hoy en día trabaja en la calle solo.
Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar una hidrolavadora y una moto para desplazarse hasta sus clientes.
Ayuda con un préstamo a Yeison a cumplir su sueño de comprar una vivienda propia a través de su trabajo!
texts.en: Yeison is a hard-working and humble man, a description he has earned well. He started a car-washing business five years ago. Today he works alone on the street. He is requesting financial support to buy a pressure-washer and a motorcycle to get to his clients. With a loan, you can help Yeison accomplish his dream of buying his own home through his work!

loans.use: to buy a pressure-washer and a motorcycle to get to his clients.

loans.name: Denis Del Carmen

texts.es:
Denis vive con sus hijos y su esposo en el municipio de Sincelejo, departamento de Sucre. Allí tiene un negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas en su propia casa, con esta actividad intenta solventar los gastos de su hogar junto con su esposo.

Este es un negocio bastante común en esta región donde las personas utilizan su casa como negocio para venta de todo tipo de productos.

Solicita un apoyo económico para realizar la compra de surtido de bebidas gaseosas para aumentar y abastecer su inventario.
texts.en:
Denis lives with her children and husband in the municipality of Sincelejo, in the department of Sucre. She has a business there where she sells carbonated beverages from her home. This allows her to help take care of the household expenses, along with her husband.

This is a fairly common business in this region, where people use their homes as a store to sell various types of products.

She is requesting economic support to be able to buy a supply of carbonated beverages to stock up and increase her inventory.

loans.use: to buy a supply of carbonated beverages to stock up and increase her inventory.

loans.name: Derenik

texts.en:
Derenik lives in Hrazdan city of Kotayk region with his wife, son and retired father. Derenik’s wife is unemployed and she greatly helps her husband in farming and agriculture. Derenik’s son is a student. 

This peasant family makes its income only through the farming. Derenik used to work as a driver, but now he is a farmer and busy with his cattle care; he has a cow, a heifer, bulls, pigs and several bee families. Derenik also has a plot of land on which he plants potatoes, tomatoes, peppers, cabbages and greens. He regularly sells all his farm products (milk, meat, honey and his land’s harvest) at the wholesale market. Derenik mentions that he works vey hard since he has no other way of earning the family income. But, he must cover his son’s education costs. 

So he wants to use this loan of 700,000 Armenian drams to buy pigs and also fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy pigs and fodder for his farm cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase: cement, sand, gravel, metal sheets with the goal of repairing the roof of her home and cementing the floor of her home.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children, all of whom go to school. She takes care of one additional family member. 

She sells bed sheets and blankets in a shop that she rents. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of 200,000 from MCDT– SACCO to buy bed sheets and blankets. 

Her major challenge includes seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to get more capital to start selling mattresses of different sizes. 

She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy bed sheets and blankets.

loans.name: Aidah

texts.en:
Aidah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with six children and all go to school. She takes care of one additional family member. She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food.

Aidah operates a boutique selling second-hand clothes. She has been in this business for the last four years. She works seven days a week. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. She has requested a loan of 400,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy a bale of used shoes.

Aidah's goal/aspiration is to build rental houses to supplement her income.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used shoes

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 50 años de edad, una persona soñadora, vive con su familia la cual es conformada por su esposo y tres hijos, trabaja en un negocio que ella con sus manos creo el cual es un restaurante.

Crecer, tener un hermoso lugar, es el sueño de María quien espera que con la ganancia de su restaurante pueda tener adquirir vivienda, vehículo, entre otros sueños locos, es por ello que viene ante la comunidad Kiva para solicitar un préstamo, pero este préstamo tiene una intención y es que servirá para impulsar y formalizar su negocio puesto que con el monto comprara sillas, mesas, manteles, decoración e insumos para la preparación de alimentos.
texts.en:
María is a 50 year old woman. A dreamer, she lives with her family, which is made up of her husband and three children. She works in a business that she created with her own hands, which is a restaurant.

To grow, to have a beautiful place, is María's dream. She hopes that with the earnings from her restaurant she can acquire housing and a vehicle, among other wildest dreams. That is why she is coming before the Kiva community to apply for a loan. But this loan has an intention, it will serve to boost and formalize her business, because with the loan amount she will buy chairs, tables, tablecloths, decoration, and supplies for food preparation.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, tablecloths, decoration and supplies for food preparation.

loans.name: Socorro Segovia

texts.es:
Socorro, está casada y tiene un hijo de 6 años de edad, vive con su familia, no recibe ayuda del extranjero, emprendió su propio negocio como medio de subsistencia familiar y para apoyar a su esposo, administra una tienda de productos de la canasta básica, abre sus puertas al público de seis de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde.
Se siente motivada para continuar trabajando y ofreciendo un mejor inventario a sus clientes, está solicitando un crédito en Padecomsm que tiene pensado invertirlo en golosinas, gaseosas, jugos, pan dulce, huevos, etc., pretende cubrir de inmediato las necesidades de sus clientes, tiene la fe que sus ventas aumentaran y podrá tener nuevos ingresos para ir cubriendo sus compromisos.
Las aspiraciones que tiene la señora Socorro son continuar ampliando su negocio y atraer nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
Socorro, married and the mother of a 6 year old son, lives with her family and does not receive any outside support. She founded her own business as a means of family subsistence and as support for her husband. She manages a shop of basic goods, which is open to public from six in the morning to four in the afternoon. 

She feels motivated to continue working and to offer a better inventory to her customers. For this she is requesting a loan to Padecomsm, and plans to invest in candy, soda, juice, sweet bread, eggs, etc. to meet the immediate necessities of her customers. She has faith that her sales will increase and that she will have new income to cover her repayments. 

Señora Socorro's aspiration is to continue expanding her business and to attract new customers.

loans.use: to invest in candy, soda, juice, sweet bread, eggs, etc. in order to meet the immediate necessities of her customers

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María es una mujer de 40 años de edad que se dedica al transporte de personas en la ciudad de Dabeiba, anteriormente era empleada y liquidaba lo producido en su moto, pero con el ánimo de progresar y ayuda de interactuar puede tener su propio vehículo, es por ello que solicita un préstamo para compra de una motocicleta, buscando aumentar sus ingresos para lograr tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a 40-year-old woman who makes a living transporting people in the city of Dabeiba. She was previously employed, and she cashed what she earned on her motorcycle.

Now, with the desire to move forward and with the help of Interactuar, she hopes to have her own vehicle. It is for this reason that she is requesting a loan to buy a motorcycle. She is looking to increase her earnings so that she and her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle in order to increase her earnings so that she and her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.name: Tsaghik

texts.en:
Tsaghik is 33 years old and she lives with her big family in Tsovagyugh village of Gegharkunik region. By the way, this woman’s name is one of the nicest names is Armenian; it is translated as 'flower'. This woman is a mother of three children; her elder son and daughter are school-aged and her smallest son is a year old. 

Since Tsaghik’s husband is unemployed, they are both engaged in farming and agriculture. The cattle care of the farm (cows, a calf, a bull, a piglet and a lot of chickens) consumes Tsaghik, and the agricultural work is managed mainly by her husband. From their land they gather potatoes, peppers, greens, tomatoes, cucumbers and carrots. Tsaghik sells all the farm products right from her farm. 

She would like to receive this Kiva loan as she wants to buy fodder for all her farm cattle and she also must buy diesel fuel for their agricultural work.

loans.use: to buy fodder for all her farm cattle and also diesel fuel for their agricultural work

loans.name: Alfonso Juvenal

texts.es:
Alfonso es un joven de 19 años, es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive con su hermano menor quien asiste actualmente al colegio, en una casa en arriendo. Vive por la zona más reconocida y tradicional, donde producen la fritada que es un plato típico, por el sector la mayoría de personas se dedican a la confección de prendas de vestir.
Alfonso se dedica a la venta de pinchos desde hace un año, desde que empezó le ha ido muy bien, al principio solo contaba con una sola carreta de pincho pero ahora ha incrementado y cuenta con dos, él quiere seguir creciendo es por eso que solicita el crédito. La venta la realizó como iniciativa propia, Alfonso sale todas las tardes a vender su producto y lo hace al frente de la escuela La Salle de Atuntaqui. Como ahora tiene 2 carretas también le ayuda en el negocio su hermano menor a quien le paga el 10 % de las ventas realizadas. Los fines de semana su hermano sale a vender en Atuntaqui y Alfonso sale a lugares donde asisten muchas personas y a fiestas de barrios y cuenta que tiene mejores ganancias los fines de semana en este tipo de lugares.
El crédito lo va invertir en la compra de una carreta de pincho y un coche de hielo, ya que ha visto que si existe demanda de este producto por la zona, gracias a esta inversión Alfonso podrá incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida. Agradece a Fundación Alternativa por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Alfonso is a 19-year-old young man. He is single and does not have any children. He lives with his younger brother, who attends high school, in a rented house. He lives in the area that is best known for fritada, a common food, and traditional in the area. In the city sector, the majority of the people work making clothes.

For the past year, Alfonso has made a living by selling snacks. From the time that he started, it has gone very well for him. At first, he had only one food cart, but now he has expanded and has two. He wants to continue growing, which is why he is requesting the loan. He started the business out of his own initiative.

Alfonso goes out every afternoon to sell his product, which he does in front of the school La Salle de Atuntaqui. Since he now has two carts, his younger brother also helps him, and he pays him 10% of the sales he makes. On the weekends, his brother goes out to sell in Atuntqui, and Alfonso goes to busy locations and neighborhood parties. He makes more money on the weekends at these types of places.

He will invest the loan in the purchase of a snack cart and an ice car, because he has observed that there is demand for this product in the area. Thanks to this investment, Alfonso will be able to increase his income and improve his quality of life. He is thankful to Fundación Alternativa for the help that it provides.

loans.use: to buy a snack cart and an ice car

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha, 42, lives in a community of Pursat Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of six children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small rice and cassava farmland which is located near her house. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 5.00 a day.

She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration.

She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Sandra Del Rocio

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Mujeres Con Propósito se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señorita Sandra, tiene 52 años de edad,  es soltera y vive en casa de familiares, ella lleva 5 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten financiar aun más su negocio. 
Doña Sandra es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para salir adelante, ella es maestra y trabaja en un colegio de la localidad, pero además de esto ella en sociedad con una sobrina tienen una tienda de víveres cerca de su casa en un local arrendado, allí venden todo tipo de productos como granos, detergentes, carnes, legumbres, entre productos de primera necesidad,  trabajan todos los días, cuando ella puede estar en la tienda trabaja allí mientras su sobrina descansa o sino es su sobrina la que administra la tienda cuando ella está en el colegio, llevan más de 7 años con este negocio el cual mejoran con el paso de los días.
Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar más víveres para surtir su tienda. Sus sueños es tener su propio local.
texts.en:
The Mujeres con Propósito [Women with Intentions] credit group meets every 15 days near to the central market in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches which attract many visitors all year round, and for being a city of unrivalled beauty with many tourist attractions.

It is here where Sandra lives, she is 52 years old, single and lives with her relatives. She has been in the credit group for five years and she likes it because the loans allow her to finance her business even more.

Sandra is a woman who likes working to get ahead, she is a teacher and works in a local school, but as well as this she has a business partnership with her niece – they have a convenience store near their house, in a rented property.  There they sell all kinds of products like grains, detergents, meat, legumes, among other basic essentials, and work every day; whenever she can be working in the store she does so while her niece relaxes, otherwise it is her niece who runs the store while she is at school.  They have had this business for over 7 years and it is getting better as time goes on.

She will invest this loan in buying more food to stock her store with.  Her dream is to own her own store.

loans.use: to buy food supplies.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina has been raising and selling hogs for more than 20 years. She resides in the town of Talibon, Bohol and has one grown dependent. In addition to her hog business, she runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells basic commodities like canned goods, noodles, seasonings, soap, sugar, cooking oil and soft drinks. 

She is asking for a loan to restock her store with items like soft drinks, shampoo and soap. These will add more variety to her stock and will enable more buyers to shop and purchase in her store. Thus she will be able to settle her obligation and be able to handle her finances.

Regina is grateful for the opportunity of availing herself of the loan and is hoping that she can successfully manage her businesses for sustainable living.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like soft drinks, shampoo and soap

loans.name: Alexandra Margarita

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Mujeres Con Propósito se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Alexandra, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 17 y 3 años de edad, el mayor  estudia en colegio. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Alexandra es una mujer que le encanta trabajar para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, ella tiene un bazar en la casa de su suegra donde vende ropa de todo tipo, carteras, perfumes, cosas para regalos así como también materiales para la costura como hilos, cierres, entre otros, trabaja todos los días desde las 08h00 hasta las 18h00, Tiene más de 15 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual  se gana algo por el bien familiar.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, perfumes, hilos, cierres, telas y otros materiales para la costura. Lleva 7 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y a bajos intereses. Sus sueños es tener un local propio.
texts.en:
The credit group Mujeres Con Propósito [Ladies with Intentions] meets every 15 days in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches which attract many visitors all year round, and for being a city of unrivalled beauty with many tourist attractions.

It is here where Alexandra lives, she is 38 years old, is married and from this relationship they have two children of 17 and 3 years old, the eldest child is studying at school.  Her husband is a driver.

Alexandra is a woman who loves to work to help her husband with the household costs, she has a bazaar at her mother-in-law’s house where she sells all kinds of clothes, bags, perfumes, gift items as well as sewing items such as threads, zips, among other things.  She works every day from 8am to 6pm, she has been making a living with this business for over 15 years and what money she makes is contributed to the family home.

This loan is to buy clothes, shoes, perfumes, threads, zips, fabric and other sewing supplies.  She has been in the credit group for 7 years and she likes it because the loans are quick and at low interest rates.  Her dream is to own her own shop.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, perfumes, threads, zips, fabric and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Jose Luciano

texts.es:
José se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura cultivando granos básicos y también tiene crianza de cerdos y ganado, vive con su esposa y cinco hijos, todos dependen del trabajo que él realiza, el oficio se lo enseñaron sus padres, ya cuenta con 25 años de tener su propio negocio, hoy en día lo realiza con ayuda de sus hijos en un horario de siete de la mañana a tres de la tarde.
Requiere de un crédito para fortalecer su negocio, manifiesta que comprara abono, insecticidas y semilla para sembrar granos básicos, así mismo adquirirá concentrado para alimentar a los cerdos, espera obtener el máximo provecho del crédito y mejorar su situación financiera, el riesgo es una temporada con pocas lluvias, pues sus cultivos no tendrían un buen desarrollo.
Sus aspiraciones son tener cosechas abundantes e ir preparándose para cubrir los gastos de la próxima cosecha.
texts.en:
José works in agriculture, cultivating basic grains as well as breeding pigs and cattle. He lives with his wife and five sons, all of whom depend on his work, a practice José learned from his parents. He has had his own business for 25 years. Nowadays, he works with the help of his children from seven in the morning to three in the afternoon. 

José requires a loan to strengthen his business. He presents that he will purchase fertilizer, insecticides, and seeds to sow basic grains, and with this also acquire feedstuff for the pigs. He hopes to get the most out of the loan and to improve his economic situation. One risk is having a dry season with little rain, since his crops would not grow well. His dream is to have abundant harvests and to start preparing for the costs of the next harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, insecticides, and seeds to sow basic grains, and from this to acquire feedstuff for nourishing the pigs

loans.name: Ana Maritza

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos de 18, 16 y 14 años de edad, por la necesidad de nuevos ingresos para solventar los gastos familiares decidió iniciar a vender lociones, cremas, cosméticos, accesorios de enchape y otros productos de revista, tiene una persona que le ayuda realizar dicha actividad, trabaja tres días a la semana, de 8:00 am. a 12:00 m., lo realiza de manera ambulante, ya tiene una cartera de clientes muy amplia y aprendió el oficio por iniciativa propia.
Invertirá en un lote de productos como cosméticos, pulseras, aretes, anillos, lociones, etc., para vender nuevos productos a sus clientes, espera que su negocio sea más competitivo y pueda atraer nuevos clientes para incrementar las ventas y sus ganancias.
Las aspiraciones de Ana son seguir trabajando para lograr que sus hijos sigan estudiando y luego apoyarlos para que establezcan su propio negocio y así tener un estilo de vida más confortable.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her husband and three children who are 18, 16, and 14 years old. She needed a new form of income to cover household expenses, so she decided to start selling lotions, cremes, cosmetics, plated jewelry, and other products from magazines.

She has someone who helps her do this. She works three days a week from 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM. She does this as a traveling salesperson and has a long list of customers. She learned this trade through her own initiative. 

She will buy a batch of products such as cosmetics, bracelets, earrings, rings, lotions, etc., so she can sell new products to her customers. She expects her business to become more competitive and attract new customers to increase sales and profits. 

Ana hopes to continue working so she can keep sending her children to school and, later on, help them start their own business so they can have a comfortable style of living.

loans.use: to buy a batch of products such as cosmetics, bracelets, earrings, rings, lotions, etc., so that she can sell new products to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to establish a store. She will buy basic goods.

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es:
Sandra, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casada y su pareja trabaja con un pick-up haciendo viajes, tiene dos hijos que viven en casa con ellos, uno trabaja y el otro estudia. 

Sandra, trabaja con ganado de repasto desde hace más de 15 años y lo aprendio de sus hermanos y decidio hacerlo para buscar un ingreso economico para su familia, tambien tiene tienda y molino de nixtamal, antes solo se dedicaba a los oficios domesticos; la distancia donde mantiene el ganado está a 1/2 kilómetros de su casa y viaja a pie. 

Sandra, necesita el dinero del crédito para comprar ganado de repasto, con esto mejorara mucho ya que podra tener más ganado y generar mayores ganancias.

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para darle un mejor futuro a su familia y también sueña con tener una tienda más surtida.
texts.en:
Sandra studied until sixth grade. She is married and her partner works by doing trips with a pickup truck. She has two children who live in the house with them. One works and the other one studies. 

For more than 15 years, Sandra has worked with grazing cattle. She learned this from her siblings and decided to do it to obtain an income for her family. She also has a store and a corn mill. Before, she only made a living in domestic work. The location where she keeps the cattle is a half kilometer from her house, and she goes there on foot.

Sandra needs the money from this loan to buy grazing cattle. With this, a lot will get better since she will be able to have more cattle and generate more earnings. 

Her dreams are to continue working to give her family a better future. She also dreams of having a better stocked store.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve her cafe and buy things like sweets, soft rinks, cookies and juices.

loans.name: El Paraiso Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “EL PARAISO” iniciará el ciclo treinta y ocho en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Adela, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Santusa es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de dulces, venta de regalos, venta de lana, venta de sombreros, tienda de barrio,  venta de gorros, venta de comida y venta de ropa para bebé.
	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Santusa es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a  Pro Mujer ingresando por una promoción masiva de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia hace treinta años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de gaseosas, dulces y leche por mayor) que lo adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto para posteriormente comercializarlo en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera  y tiene seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta  el ahorro y la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank EL PARAISO began in the 38th loan cycle in Pro Mujer as a part of Centro Focal de Villa Adela. It’s composed of nine members, and is run by a board of directors, where Santusa is the secretary. There is a variety of businesses maintained by the members of the group, including a corner store, and the sale of candies, gifts, wool, hats and caps, food, and baby clothes.

The loan they’re taking out will benefit small microbusinesses where Santusa is a member. She says she joined Pro Mujer because of a large promotion at the institution. Currently, she runs a corner store. She wants people to know that she learned this business on her own thirty years ago.

The loan she will take out will be used for increasing capital for the purchase of wholesale soft drinks, candies, and milk, which she will acquire from wholesalers in the city of El Alto to later sell in her store. This kind of work allows Santusa to generate resources to support her family economically, since she’s single and has six children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the savings and training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy wholesale soft drinks, candies, and milk.

loans.name: Maritza Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito 12 De Octubre se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Gabriel  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Maritza, tiene 32 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos  hijos de 14 y 7  años que estudian la mayor en colegio y el menor en una escuela especial porque es discapacitado. Su marido es artesano y comerciante.
Doña Maritza es una muy buena esposa que realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice en sus actividades, él desde hace 10 años vende pescado, todos los días el se desplaza hasta la playa lugar en el cual muchos comerciantes como él se dedican a la venta de mariscos, allí el instala una mesa en la cual vende sus pescados a muchas personas que a diario pasan por el lugar, ella por su parte también en su casa prepara desayunos, almuerzos y meriendas para seis personas que trabajan en una empresa cerca de su casa lo cual le genera sus propios ingresos que le sirven para ayudarle a su marido a salir adelante 
Este crédito es para comprar pescado y víveres para preparar los alimentos. Lleva 4 ciclos  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son seguir adelante y gozar de buena salud.
texts.en:
El Grupo De Crédito 12 De Octubre meets every two weeks in the San Gabriel neighbourhood in the city of Manta. This city is famous for its beautiful beaches that are visited throughout the year, and for being a city of unsurpassed beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where Maritza lives. She is 32 years old and is in a common law marriage with two children aged 14 and 7. Both children study; her older daughter in school and her younger son in a special school as he is disabled. Her husband is an artisan and tradesman.

Maritza is a very good wife who is taking out a loan so that her husband can use it for his work. For the last 10 years he has been selling fish. Every day he goes to the beach where many tradesmen like him work selling seafood. He sets up a table there to sell his seafood to the many people who pass through daily. For her part, Maritza makes breakfast, lunch and snacks in her home for six people that work in a nearby business. This is how she generates her own income that she uses to help her husband to get ahead.

This loan is to buy fish, and supplies to prepare the meals. She has spent 4 loan cycles in the Grupo De Crédito and she likes it because the loans help a lot. Her dreams are to stay ahead and to enjoy good health.

loans.use: to buy fish and supplies.

loans.name: Sandra Regina

texts.es:
Sandra tiene 32 años, es una mujer emprendedora que lucha por sacar adelante a su hija, es divorciada y por su hija ha logrado mantener una relación tranquila con su expareja, vive en casa arrendada con su hija de 11 años que actualmente cursa el último año de la escuela. Vive en el sector de Caranqui de la ciudad  de Ibarra, el lugar es turístico porque ahí se hace el pan de leche y helados de crema.
El negocio que va emprender es una tienda de víveres de primera necesidad y va estar ubicado en el centro de la ciudad de Ibarra, el local ya lo tiene previsto, ya habló con el dueño del local y arreglaron el precio del arriendo, tiene experiencia en el negocio ya que antes trabajó durante 3 años en una panadería, la tienda la va atender desde las 6:30 hasta las 8:00 pm. Gracias a que el negocio se encuentra en el centro podrá estar más al pendiente de su hija que estudia en una escuela cercana al local que va arrendar, y podrá estar más al pendiente de su hija. Sandra también tiene los contactos de los proveedores que le facilitaran los productos para su negocio porque los obtuvo cuando trabajo en la panadería. Actualmente ella trabaja en un restaurante, pero desea independizarse con un negocio propio es por eso que solicita un crédito.
El crédito lo va invertir en la compra de una vitrina, una estantería, un mostrador y víveres para la tienda, Sandra agradece a KIVA por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Sandra is 32 years old. She is an enterprising woman fighting to bring up her daughter. She is divorced and for the sake of her daughter has managed to maintain a tranquil relationship with her former partner.

She lives in a rented house with her 11 year old daughter who is currently studying in the last year of school. She lives in the Carangui sector of the city of Ibarra, the place tourists go because they make bread there with milk and ice cream from cream.

The business she is going to open is a grocery store selling basic staples and it will be located in the center of the city of Ibarra. She has the facility already planned. She has spoken with the owner of the place and agreed on the amount of rent. She has experience in the business as she worked for 3 years in a bakery. She will be in the store from 6:30 until 8:00pm.

Because the business is located in the city center she can be more mindful of her daughter studying in a school nearby the place she is going to rent and be able to keep an eye on her daughter. Sandra also has the contacts of suppliers that provide products for her business because she obtained them when working in the bakery.

Currently she works in a restaurant. She wants to become independent with a business of her own and this is why she is applying for a loan. She will use the loan to buy a display cabinet, shelves, a counter and groceries for the store. 

Sandra is thankful to Kiva for their support.

loans.use: To start up her business she wants to open her own food shop

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en:
Ruzanna is a pedagogue and she lives in Sevan, a city in the province of Gegharkunik. She graduated from Yerevan State Linguistic University. Now she works at the local school as a teacher of English Language and Literature.

Ruzanna is not married and she lives alone. In her house she also gives paid private courses of English Language and Literature, preparing students for their entrance exams. As Ruzanna says, she likes her occupation and her daily contact with very clever pupils who are very intelligent and interesting.

She is asking for this loan to purchase a computer and professional literature in order to make her private courses more informative and interesting.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and professional literature in order to make her private courses more informative and interesting

loans.name: Emprendedores Group

texts.es:
En una comunidad de Oaxaca, el principal atractivo es la presa que ofrece trabajo a una gran parte de los habitantes quienes se dedican a la pesca y venta de mojarra en los alrededores.

Tal como el nombre lo indica, ser emprendedores es la característica principal de cada uno de los integrantes del grupo quienes por cuenta propia han iniciado una actividad con el firme propósito de ofrecer lo mejor a su familia. Los miembros y sus actividades son:

Santa - Sastrería 
María Izolda - Venta de Ropa, Cosméticos Y Tacos 
Juan - Despacho Contable 
María - Venta de Ropa Y Calzado 
Emma - Venta de Ropa 
Joel - Venta de Pollo 
Maritza - Venta de Refrescos
